hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Shu'ba with the same chain of transmitters (and the words are):" He who emancipates a portion in a slave, he should (secure full) freedom for him from his property

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَعْتَقَ شِرْكًا لَهُ فِي عَبْدٍ
chapter.eng-name: One who frees his share in a slave
